title: Synthesis and characterization of macrodiols and non-segmented poly(ester-urethanes) (PEUs) derived from α,ω-hydroxy telechelic poly(ε-caprolactone) (HOPCLOH): effect of initiator, degree of polymerization, and diisocyanate
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27241-27251
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03951C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Miriam P. Barrera-Nava, Rodrigo Navarro, Ángel Marcos-Fernández, José E. Báez
This study explores three different factors such as the initiator, degree of polymerization and diisocyanate on the properties of macrodiols and poly(ester-urethanes) (PEUs).
